body.note: The XPath expression from the page rules is evaluated in the context of the document root element, so you will need to use absolute expressions starting with / or //. This is different from the case when the oxy_xpath is used in CSS rules that match an element. In this case, the XPath expressions are evaluated in the context of the matched element and you can use relative paths.
You cannot use multiple column configurations on the same page. only takes the column-count and column-gap properties into account if they are set on @page rules, not on elements from the content.
body.p: Oxygen Styles Basket is a handy free-to-use web-based visual tool that helps you create your own Publishing Template Package to customize your DITA Map WebHelp Responsive and/or DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS transformation scenarios.
